title: Karapitiya Hospital limits patient intake
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Director of the Karapitiya Hospital Dr. Shelton Perera said that the admission of patients has been restricted due to low employee turnout.
He said that due to the current situation the attendance of employees is limited to around 50 percent.
Dr. Shelton Perera said, however, that emergency patient admissions will continue.
